body:
We're adding this directly to the gamma random sampler.  Can leave it open
until we push the change.

On Feb 14, 2017 5:05 PM, "Andrew Selle" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> So, for clarity, you just add epsilon to your input to avoid inputting
> zero? Can you close the issue if it is satisfactorily resolved?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
